attributes.action: Stop bully XL Ban and BSL until new Prime Minister elected by public in 2025
attributes.additional_details:
We don't think it's right that a none elected prime minister has the right to put in place Ban against bully XLS and bully types 
Too many innocent dogs fall into this ban 
The public do not agree 
The rescue centres do not agree 
Vets do not agree 
It unjustified bought on by media frenzy
attributes.background:
Revoke Bully XL and BSL legislation 
Wait until a public elected prime minister is sitting in 2025

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
